channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: One-hour strike on Wednesday, 17 September 2025
item.description: On Wednesday, 17 September 2025, due to a national strike, university staff may stop working one hour before the end of their shift, thereby causing service disruptions.%0AThe strike will not affect the following: final exams for Bachelor‚Äôs and Master‚Äôs degrees, postgraduate schools and PhD programmes; issuing of urgent certificates.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Call for the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam on 17 + 18 November 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B1 Preliminary (PET) exam scheduled on 17 + 18 November 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the B2 First (FCE) exam on 17 + 18 November 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B2 First (FCE) exam scheduled on 17 + 18 November 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: New Code of Conduct
item.description: The University has launched a public consultation, open until 1 October 2025 at 14, on the draft of the new Code of Conduct for its staff. The new Code is the result of a process involving both academic and non academic staff, with the aim of laying down clear, up-to-date and collectively endorsed rules on ethics, integrity and transparency.%0A%0Aüîó Learn more on La Statale News

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the B2 First (FCE) exam - SOLD OUT
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B2 First (FCE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in October-November at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 27 + 28 October 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 27 + 28 October 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam on 27 + 29 October 2025 - 1 SEAT AVAILABLE
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam scheduled on 27 + 29 October 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Open semester: course schedules and attendance
Virgilio Program 2025/26: Ranking list
item.description: The Selection Committee for the Virgilio Program 2025-26 gathered on May 15th 2025 at 12.30 am to screen applications and select applicants. Please find below the final ranking list, including the names of all applicants selected for the Virgilio Program 2025-26. %0A%0AüìÑ Virgilio program - Ranking linst 2025/26

item.title: Dual Career programme for student-athletes
item.description: As of 15 July 2025, students can submit their application for the Dual Career programme, aimed at supporting high-level athletes in balancing their competitive sports commitments with university career.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
